name: BibleStories|StoryQubeOriginals
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bible stories
des:
Stories from the Bible have inspired generations across millennia. These stories are not purely religious but they teach you ways of life and give guidance on how you can overcome hurdles by following the path of Love with God in your heart. 

Currently has one story - David and Goliath. A new story will be added every month 

StoryQube originals presents to you the stories from the Bible in a professionally produced audio format like never before. For more information about StoryQube, visit https://www.storyqube.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
